headline: 3M to return $10 billion to shareholders, reiterates sales forecast
summary: Bill Brown, who succeeded Mike Roman as CEO in May, has focused on developing new products, redirecting spending from the company's earlier priorities of mitigating legal liabilities and reducing supply-chain costs.  Saint Paul, Minnesota-based 3M has also focused on reining in costs and exiting less-profitable consumer product lines to combat slowing demand as part of its restructuring efforts.  3M also reaffirmed its annual forecast of organic sales growth in the range of 2% to 3%.

headline: 3M Provides Medium-Term Financial Outlook at 2025 Investor Day; Presents Strategic Priorities that Will Drive Growth, Operational Excellence, and Return Cash to Shareholders
summary: 3M (NYSE: MMM) will host its 2025 Investor Day today in St. Paul, Minnesota, beginning at 8 a.m. CST. During the event, 3M will provide its medium-term financial outlook, and leadership will discuss priorities that will deliver sustainable value creation.

headline: 3M reaffirms 2025 sales forecast ahead of investor day
summary: 3M Co said on Wednesday the diversified manufacturer expects operating margin to be about 25% by 2027 and reaffirmed its annual forecast of organic sales growth in the range of 2% to 3%. ...
